Alnwick Castle

Alnwick Castle is a castle and country house in Alnwick in the English county of Northumberland [1].

Creator: Phil Thomas
Licence: CC BY-SA 2.0
Source Link: https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Alnwick_Castle_02.jpg

Alnwick Castle is known to the public as Hogwarts Castle in the Harry Potter films.

Creator: Justin Norris
Licence: CC BY-SA 4.0
Source Link: https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Alnwick_Castle_Altar.JPG

In 《Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone》:

00:40:45: A field for first year wizards to practice their flying brooms

00:52:24 and 01:42:07: Hollow mirror of the external structure of Hogwarts

Its condition is in stark contrast to the vast majority of the country's castles, which have fallen into disrepair and are unfit for habitation [2].

Address: Alnwick Castle Alnwick, Northumberland NE66 1NQ
